Paytable.paybackBody: For this game, the long-term, theoretically-expected payback {RTP}.
Paytable.overallChances: There is a 1 in {odds} overall chance of winning a prize on each play.

Error.genericErrorText: There has been an internal error. EXIT and relaunch the game.

message_win.TRY:
THANKS FOR PLAYING!
YOU COULD HAVE WON

landscape.text1: Match Your Numbers to Lucky Numbers and win a prize.
landscape.text2: Reveal {img} to double the prize amount.
landscape.text3: Reveal {img} and win all prizes instantly.

portrait.text1: Match Your Numbers to Lucky Numbers and win a prize.
portrait.text2: Reveal {img} to double the prize amount.
portrait.text3: Reveal {img} and win all prizes instantly.

landscape.text1: Reveal 5 Hammers {img} in Your Numbers to enter the Bonus game.
landscape.text2:
Bonus Game
Smash 3 coin-filled piggy banks to win a prize.
Smash 3 empty piggy banks, or win the top prize, to finish the game.
